title: All Zeity Trend 6/11: Euro 2020, Stephen A. Smith, Kim Jong Un vs BTS, Coffee, 'In The Heights'
itunes:title: All Zeity Trend 6/11: Euro 2020, Stephen A. Smith, Kim Jong Un vs BTS, Coffee, 'In The Heights'
description:
On this edition of All Zeity Trend Jack and Miles discuss Euro 2020, Stephen A. Smith's bold declaration, Kim Jong Un hating on BTS, an anachronistic cup of coffee, and 'In The Heights".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
